meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a biscuit.
meanings.sent1: The biscuity smell of fresh cookies filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The bread had a biscuity taste that reminded me of home.
meanings.sent3: The biscuity texture of the sand made it perfect for building sandcastles.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a warm, biscuity quality that made everyone feel at ease.
meanings.sent5: The biscuity color of the leaves in autumn was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Having a texture or flavor similar to a biscuit.
meanings.sent1: The soup had a biscuity consistency that was comforting on a cold day.
meanings.sent2: The pastry was so biscuity and delicious, I couldn't stop eating it.
meanings.sent3: The biscuity aroma of the freshly baked bread made my stomach growl.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was light and biscuity, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The biscuity texture of the fabric was soft against my skin.
